title.text: A niche at the nexus: situating an NLP curriculum interdisciplinarily

abstractContent.text: This paper discusses the establishment and implementation of a curriculum for teaching NLP.

At the core are two classes which involve some theoretical background, extensive hands-on experience with state-of-the-art technologies, and practical application in the form of an intensive programming project.
Issues involving interdis-ciplinary coordination, curriculum design, and challenges in teaching this discipline are discussed.
